text:
SuqkrAstA naq ApaqH Sa(gg) syOqnA Ba#vantu || 
SiqvEna# mAq cakShu#ShA paSyatA&&*paH SiqvayA# taqnuvOpa# spRuSataq tvaca#M mE |
sarvA(gm)# aqgnI(gm) ra#PsuqShadO# huvE vOq mayiq varcOq balaqmOjOq ni dha#tta ||
yadaqdaH sa#M prayaqqtIrahAqq vana#datAhaqtE | 
tasmAqdA naqdyO# nAma# sthaq tA vOq nAmA#ni sindhavaH || 
yat prEShi#tAq varu#NEnaq tAH SIBa(gm)# saqmava#lgata | 2
